title: FF! Doc | LdapFindGroupMembershipsPipe
paragraphs: Pipe that returns the memberships of a userDN. The input is a fullDn, of a user or a group.
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

LdapFindMemberPipe
LdapFindGroupMembershipsPipe
Pipes

Pipe that returns the memberships of a userDN. The input is a fullDn, of a user or a group.

Sample result:

<ldap>
     <entry name="CN=xxyyzz,OU=Users,DC=domain,DC=ext">
         <attributes>
             <attribute>
             <attribute name="memberOf" value="Extern"/>
             <attribute name="departmentCode" value="358000"/>
             <attribute name="organizationalHierarchy">
                 <item value="ou=zzyyxx"/>
                 <item value="ou=OPS&IT,ou=Group,ou=domain,o=ext"/>
             </attribute>
             <attribute name="givenName" value="Gerrit">
         </attributes>
     </entry>
     <entry> .... </entry>
 </ldap>
